objects.name: Analytic 0997
objects.description: Detection of execution of legacy scripting runtimes (e.g., older versions of Python, Bash, or PowerShell Core) lacking auditing. Monitoring for changes to EFI or system boot files indicative of downgrade-based persistence or bypass of integrity features.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of older or non-standard interpreters

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Modifications or writes to EFI system partition for downgraded bootloaders

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Defines the minimal version of interpreters expected; older versions flagged as downgrade attempts.
